brief: This command adds existing subnets to existing shared networks.
cmd-comment: The ``network6-subnet-add`` command uses exactly the same syntax as ``network4-subnet-add`` for both the query and the response.
name: network6-subnet-add
resp-syntax: "text": "IPv4 subnet 10.0.0.0/8 (id 5) is now part of shared network 'floor1'"
